problem_statement.label: Problem Statement
problem_statement.help: Brief description of the issue (1-3 sentences)
problem_statement.placeholder: Example: Patient discharge instructions are frequently incomplete, leading to readmission risks and patient confusion.

what.label: What: The Problem
what.help: Describe the failure, defect, or issue in specific, observable terms
what.placeholder: Example: Discharge paperwork missing medication lists and follow-up appointment details

when.label: When: Timing & Frequency
when.help: When does the problem occur? Include timing, frequency, or triggers if known
when.placeholder: Example: Occurs during evening shift discharges when staffing is reduced

where.label: Where: Location & Context
where.help: Where in the process, system, or environment does it happen?
where.placeholder: Example: In the discharge workflow between nurse documentation and final patient handoff

who.label: Who: Stakeholders
who.help: Who is affected? Who discovered it? Who can help solve it?
who.placeholder: Example: Affects patients and caregivers; discovered by case management; needs nursing and IT involvement

why.label: Why: Impact & Business Case
why.help: Why is this a problem? Describe consequences, business impact, or strategic importance
why.placeholder: Example: Increases readmission rates, creates patient safety risks, and affects HCAHPS scores

how.label: How: Manifestation & Detection
how.help: How does the problem manifest? How was it detected? Any observable patterns?
how.placeholder: Example: Patients call with medication questions; readmission audits show discharge instruction gaps
